translation.header_description: Graduando em Análise e Desenvolvimento de Sistemas com experiência na elaboração de soluções lógicas para problemas complexos.
translation.about_p1: Sou fascinado por Física e explorador na área de programação. Enquanto estive cursando Física, tive meu primeiro contato com uma linguagem de marcação: o LaTeX. Desde então despertou em mim uma curiosidade sobre codificação e, pouco tem depois, resolvi cursar Análise e Desenvolvimento de Sistemas.
translation.about_p2: Sou uma pessoa motivada e bem organizada, buscando sempre uma nova maneira de aprender.
translation.about_p3: Na faculdade estudei Python primeiro e depois PHP. Mas foi quando comecei a estudar HTML, CSS e JavaScript que senti que a programação era o que eu realmente queria fazer pela minha vida.
translation.resume_job2_details: Realizei atendimento ao público focando sempre na satisfação das necessidades dos clientes de forma rápida e eficaz Elaborei planilhas para o controle e organização de processos, bem como documentações diversas, eletrônicas e impressas, a serem enviadas para clientes, com ênfase na rapidez.
translation.resume_job1_details: Auxiliei na elaboração de planilhas para cálculo de refinanciamento de empréstimo bancário, consórcio e leasing. Coletei e analisei dados referente à extratos bancários.
translation.resume_college_course: Tecnologia em Análise e Desenvolvimento de Sistemas
translation.resume_college_details: The Systems Analysis and Development course aims to enable students to design, document, specify, implement, test, deploy, and maintain computer information systems.
translation.resume_course3_details: An immersive course focused on Full Stack training, based on real world challenges and using the 7-2-1 method: 70% coding, 20% networking and 10% branding.
translation.resume_course2_details: A complete course focused on fullstack programming, from basic concepts in HTML and CSS to advanced programming in Reacts and Typescript.
translation.resume_course1_details: A course focused on the use and application of Python in Finance, developing calculations and simulations of return on investments and also their risks and rates.
translation.resume_technologies_description: Here are the languages and technologies that I use:
translation.resume_technologies_html: It is a standard markup language for web page creation. It allows the creation and structure of sections, paragraphs, and links using HTML elements (the building blocks of a web page) such as tags and attributes.
translation.resume_technologies_css: While HTML is used to structure a web document, Cascading Style Sheet language comes through and specifies your document’s style — page layouts, colors, and fonts are all determined with CSS syntax, meaning that CSS is one important language for you to master in terms of styling your web pages!
translation.resume_technologies_javascript: JavaScript is a dynamic programming language that's used for web development, in web applications, for game development, and lots more. It allows you to implement dynamic features on web pages that cannot be done with only HTML and CSS.
translation.resume_technologies_react: React is a library to create single page web or mobile applications and building composable user interfaces. It encourages the creation of reusable UI components, which present data that changes over time.
translation.resume_technologies_nodejs: Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform, back-end JavaScript runtime environment that runs on a JavaScript Engine (i.e. V8 engine) and executes JavaScript code outside a web browser, which was designed to build scalable network applications.
translation.resume_technologies_git: Git is a free and open source distributed version control system designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with speed and efficiency.
translation.resume_project1_description: This was my first project developing the Front and Back-end, using PHP as the main language and MySQL for the database. The project consists of a platform where the user registers an item to be borrowed, informing the date to be returned.
